Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Mostly, the feedback from GenAI provide revised version of my work, so it do not give me a time to think critically to proved revised version by my own. In addition, it sometimes generate wrong answer, so I still need to re-check the answer. It takes time. 
Feedback from teacher, on the other hand, is critical feedback. so, I have time too generate better work by my own thought and improve my critical thinking.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes, in regards to the trustworthy, I have 100% trust towards my lecturer, so I just need to listen and use the feedback to revise my work. In contrast with GenAI, I need more time to trust the feedback because I have to do another research to prove that the feedback it true.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
Understanding. 
My lecturer understand my struggle and mistake in writing and give suitable answer /feedback for it, but GenAI sometimes do not understand this situation, which why sometimes lead to incorrect answer.
